Package common.hardware.limelight

Class Limelight

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.hardware.limelight.Limelight
  • public class Limelight
extends java.lang.Object
    Software wrapper to obtain data from and send data to the physical Limelight. LIMELIGHT CONVENTIONS: - When the target is right of the vertical centerline, tx is positive. - When the target is above the horizontal centerline, ty is positive.

      • Limelight

        public Limelight​(java.lang.String hostname,
                 double cameraAngle,
                 double cameraHeight,
                 double frontDistance)
        Parameters:
        cameraAngle - - The vertical angle of the limelight
        cameraHeight - - The height off of the ground of the limelight
        frontDistance - - The distance between the front of the robot and the Limelight

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        public double getValue​(LimelightKey key)
        Gets the median value of the data value in a certain key output by the Limelight. Switched from average to median to attempt to mitigate outliers
        Parameters:
        key - - the LimelightKey corresponding to the desired value.
        Returns:
